name: witnet-youtube-viewcount-oracle
description: A totally decentralized YouTube viewcount oracle
author: Shronk

scripts.compile: npm run compile:requests && npm run compile:contracts
scripts.flatten: mkdir contracts/flattened/ 2>/dev/null; npx truffle-flattener contracts/Monetizer.sol > contracts/flattened/Flattened.sol
scripts.fmt!: npm run fmt!:js && npm run fmt!:sol
scripts.fmt: npm run fmt:js && npm run fmt:sol
scripts.migrate:flattened: npm run flatten && npx truffle migrate --config flattened-config.js
scripts.verify: npx truffle run verify --network goerli Monetizer
scripts.host: npm run copy-needed && npx live-server src
scripts.try: npm run compile:requests && npx witnet-toolkit try-data-request --from-solidity ./contracts/requests/
